titles.title: TIER Act
TIER Act
Transition Improvement by Estimating Risk Act
To amend title 10, United States Code, to establish new pathways for counseling in the Transition Assistance Program of the Department of Defense.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Transition Improvement by Estimating Risk Act or the TIER Act
This bill adds additional factors for the design of the counseling pathways to address the needs of members of the Armed Forces under the Transition Assistance Program.
